explains: n. 饭店主人；餐馆老板

sentences.en: "I budget for bribes," admits a Lebanese restaurateur.
sentences.cn: “我预算贿赂，”一位黎巴嫩餐馆老板承认。

sentences.en: A Hollywood restaurateur named Dan Tana is also on board with the project.
sentences.cn: 一位叫Dan Tana的好莱坞餐馆老板也参加了这个项目。

sentences.en: A former restaurateur, he claims to be pro-business, so long as that business is environmentally sound.
sentences.cn: 曾经是一名餐厅经营者，他宣称支持商业，只要这些商业对环境无害。
